overview: Eric (Chad White) is fresh out of jail when he arrives at the house of his stepsister Tanya (Casey Calvert). He only thought of her during his incarceration. However Eric's joy at finding Tanya is not really mutual. Afraid of losing Tanya, Eric starts guilting her for just ONE NIGHT with her. It seems as through the guilt of letting an innocent man take the fall finally plays in Eric's favor.  Jaimie (Alina Lopez) is going through hardship at home with her abusive father. Dejected by the situation, she is received by school counselor Mr. Harris (Tommy Pistol) to try to help her. Distraught byt the situation, she wildlt kissed the counselor to forget his problems. Not knowing what to do, Mr. Harris succombs to Jaime's sexual temptation.
title: I Did It For You
